SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY A.INSERTDATE, A.TNUM ASC) AS TIPNUM ,A.TNUM AS TNUM ,A.TSUBJECT AS TSUBJECT ,A.TCONTENT AS TCONTENT ,A.TPHOTO AS TPHOTO ,A.TCATEGORY AS TCATEGORY ,A.WARNING AS WARNING ,A.MNUM AS MNUM ,B.MNICK AS MNICK ,A.THIT AS THIT ,TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(A.INSERTDATE),'YYYY-MM-DD') AS INSERTDATE ,TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(A.UPDATEDATE), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS UPDATEDATE ,CEIL(ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY A.TNUM DESC)/#{pageSize, jdbcType=VARCHAR}) AS pagesize ,COUNT(A.TNUM) OVER() AS totalCount
,#{searchCategory, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AS searchCategory
,#{keyword, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AS keyword
,#{startDate, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AS startDate
,#{endDate, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AS endDate
FROM "ORCLICT00"."ICT_TIP" A ,"ORCLICT00"."ICT_MEMBER" B WHERE A.MNUM = B.MNUM AND A.DELETEYN = 'Y' AND B.DELETEYN = 'Y'
AND A.TCATEGORY = #{searchCategory, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND A.TSUBJECT LIKE '%' || #{keyword, jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%'
AND TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#{startDate, jdbcType=VARCHAR}), 'YYYY-MM-DD') <= TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(A.INSERTDATE), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#{endDate, jdbcType=VARCHAR}), 'YYYY-MM-DD') >= TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(A.INSERTDATE), 'YYYY-MM-DD')
ORDER BY A.TNUM DESC ) WHERE pageSize = #{curPage, jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT A.TNUM AS TNUM ,A.TSUBJECT AS TSUBJECT ,A.TCONTENT AS TCONTENT ,A.TPHOTO AS TPHOTO ,A.TCATEGORY AS TCATEGORY ,A.WARNING AS WARNING ,A.MNUM AS MNUM ,A.THIT AS THIT ,A.DELETEYN AS DELETEYN ,TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(A.INSERTDATE), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS INSERTDATE ,TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(A.UPDATEDATE), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS UPDATEDATE ,B.MNICK AS MNICK ,NVL((SELECT COUNT(LNUM) FROM "ORCLICT00"."ICT_LIKE" WHERE LIKETHIS = #{tnum}), 0) AS LIKECNT FROM "ORCLICT00"."ICT_TIP" A ,"ORCLICT00"."ICT_MEMBER" B ,"ORCLICT00"."ICT_LIKE" C WHERE A.MNUM = B.MNUM(+) AND A.DELETEYN = 'Y' AND B.DELETEYN = 'Y' AND C.LIKEYN = 'Y' AND A.TNUM = #{tnum} group by A.TNUM, A.TSUBJECT, A.TCONTENT, A.TPHOTO, A.TCATEGORY, A.WARNING, A.MNUM, A.THIT, A.DELETEYN, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(A.INSERTDATE), 'YYYY-MM-DD'), TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(A.UPDATEDATE), 'YYYY-MM-DD'), B.MNICK

SELECT A.TNUM AS TNUM ,A.TSUBJECT AS TSUBJECT ,A.TCONTENT AS TCONTENT ,A.TPHOTO AS TPHOTO ,A.TCATEGORY AS TCATEGORY ,A.DELETEYN AS DELETEYN ,TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(A.INSERTDATE), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS INSERTDATE ,TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(A.UPDATEDATE), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS UPDATEDATE FROM "ORCLICT00"."ICT_TIP" A WHERE A.DELETEYN = 'Y' AND A.TNUM = #{tnum}
